title: 【尸晓】第五章——神秘人的真面目
txt_content:
NITS小队啊，本来只是倍你们玩玩而已，竟然你们不给我桥过，那我也不给你们路走！！！————神秘人
故事接上集 
                                                                全部给我下地狱吧！
“哟！援军来了，看看是谁！”直升机放下了绳梯，爬下了几个人。”纳尼！爱丽丝！诺娜！”“老爸，有没有想我啊”诺娜高兴的说这“想你个熊啊，你为什么临阵脱逃！”“我去请救兵了啊”“你那个叫做救兵，就爱丽丝一个人，也能算是救兵？”神秘人：“你们别吵了，反正都是要死的，还吵什么，去死吧！” 一阵机器的声音再次响起，中央出现了一个巨型的大炮【武器介绍：大炮：原名：防僵尸大炮·抗僵尸大炮，有极强的毁灭性，是特警为了消灭巨型僵尸而准备的】“哇嚓嚓嚓！这玩意！？”那全场人都大吃一斤。。。。。。
库斯：这武器。。。。看起来好霸气啊！
爱丽丝：这是抗僵尸大炮，他怎么会有？
神秘人：去死吧，抗僵尸大炮启动！
系统：缓存完毕，开始发射！
爱丽丝：快闪开
BOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!
地板出现了一个巨型的大洞
库斯：好险啊
施特：诺娜那去了
库斯：死丫头， 又玩失踪
爱丽丝:改不会被。。。。。炸成灰烬了吧。。。。
库斯：应该不会的，应该不会的。
斯特：我们赶快找找
神秘人：别找了，反正全部都要死，到不如去黄泉路下相会吧，灭哈哈哈
系统：缓存完毕，开始发射
系统：发射失败，停止发射
神秘人：怎么回这样？
诺娜：哈哈，终于把发射系统拆掉了
神秘人：可恶！看来，我不出动是不行的了
库斯：要现真身了吗，也好。让我们看看你邪恶的面孔吧
一个黑影落在的地上
NITS小队全部人：这是！
一个2米高的怪兽，那这个巨大的镰刀
神秘人：受死吧！
一个巨大的镰刀挥了下来
库斯：啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊
斯特：你叫什么，又们劈到你
库斯：配合一下气氛吗
爱丽丝：别闹了，快攻击
一阵枪响过后
神秘人：哈哈哈，无知的人类啊，你以为子弹就能伤的了我吗
神秘人：巨镰狂舞！
一阵大风后
库斯：嗯？我们没事
爱丽丝：诶，奇怪，我们不是应该死了吗
斯特：看，神秘人的头掉了
神秘人的尸体趴在那边，头已经整个被切掉了，滚落在地上
库斯：这是何方神圣干的
爱丽丝：围墙上有人！
在月光下，站着五个黑影…………
                                                           ————未完待续

以下为英文版
O NITS squad, originally just times you play, you don't give me the bridge, then I also will not give you way!!!!!!!!!!! -- - the mystery man
Story connected to set
Give me all go to hell!
\"Hey! Reinforcements come, and see who it is!\" The helicopter down the rope ladder, down a few people. \"Nani!! Alice nona!\" \"Dad, do you think I ah\" nona happily say that \"you a bear, why are you ratting out!\" \"I went to see my savior.\" \"you the man called reinforcements, Alice is a person, also can be regarded as reinforcements?\" Mystery man: \"you don't make so much noise, it is to die, what is noisy, go to hell!\" A machine voice rang again, the central appeared a huge cannon [weapons is introduced: the cannon: formerly known as: the zombie artillery against zombie artillery, strong destructive, is ready to swat in order to eliminate the giant zombie 】 \"wow scrape Cha! It!?\" The whole people is big eat 1 catty...
Library: this weapon... Look forward!
Alice: this is a fight zombie artillery, how could he have?
Mystery man: go to dead, fight zombie artillery launch!
System: cache, began to launch!
Alice: dead
BOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!
There was a giant hole floor
Libraries: had a narrow squeak!
Straw: nona that went
Library: dead wench, and playing missing
Alice: change is not... The Fried into ashes...
Library: there should be no, and it should not.
Stern: we look for quickly
Mystery man: don't find, anyway, all will die, than to go to meet under the yellow road, ha, ha, ha
System: the cache and began firing
System: failure to launch, stop firing
Mystery man: how so?
Nona: haha, finally pulled down launch system
Mystery man: damn! I'm not on duty, it seems, is not enough
To look, to now, all right. Let's take a look at your evil face
A shadow falls on the ground
NITS team all: this is!
A 2 meters tall monster, that this giant scythe
Mystery man: die!!!!
A giant scythe swing down
Library: ohoo agghh ah ha
Stern: what's your name, and hit you
Library: cooperate with the atmosphere
Alice: don't make, quick attack
After a shot
Mystery man: ha, ha, ha, ignorance of human ah, do you think the bullet can hurt me
Mystery man: giant scythe to dance!
After a gust of wind
Library: HMM? We have no matter to
Alice: aye, strange, should we not die
Stern: look, mystery man's head off
Mystery man's body lying there, head has been cut away the whole, dropped to the floor
Library: who did this
Alice: anyone on the wall!
Standing in the moonlight, five black shadow............
